tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiseaseSpread (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_diagnosed DATE,
  transmission_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE disease_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  disease_type VARCHAR(50),
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  location_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE transmission_patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_name VARCHAR(100),
  transmission_mode VARCHAR(50),
  quarantine_required BOOLEAN,
  cluster_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE diseases_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    disease_name STRING,
    location STRING,
    date_reported DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transmission_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transmission_type STRING,
    origin_location STRING,
    destination_location STRING,
    transmission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE disease_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name STRING,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result STRING,
    researcher_name STRING
);

CREATE TABLE cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  disease_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  date_diagnosed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date_occurred DATE
)

CREATE TABLE transmission (
  transmission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  source_location VARCHAR(255),
  destination_location VARCHAR(255),
  date_transmitted DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_id INT,
  case_id INT,
  date_mapped DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (pattern_id) REFERENCES patterns(pattern_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (pattern_id) REFERENCES patterns(pattern_id)
)
